June 10, 1899 D Heptonstall Contest
Heptonstall Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
heptonstall-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
Heptonstall, West Yorkshire 1st prize £9 and 2nd prize £6 divided between Haslingden Temperance and Sowerby Bridge. 3rd prize £4. 4th prize £2.
14 bands entered, 10 bands competed.
April 13, 2012, 9:06 p.m. July 28, 2019, 8:42 a.m.
1 Haslingden Borough Band Christopher Smith
1 Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Holdsworth
3 Nazebottom Temperance Christopher Smith
4 Cornholme Edwin Swift
